languages.text: "Прощайте, соратники. Лгать вам, манипулировать и вести вас на смерть было честью и удовольствием!" {n}Прежде, чем кто-либо успевает схватить его, Комиссар прыгает в закрывающийся портал.{/n}

"Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прощайте, соратники. Лгать вам, манипулировать и вести вас на смерть было честью и удовольствием!" {n}Прежде, чем кто-либо успевает схватить его, Комиссар прыгает в закрывающийся портал.{/n}

traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

traits.locale_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

traits.locale_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: « Au revoir, camarades. Vous tromper, vous manipuler et vous pousser vers une mort certaine a été à la fois un plaisir et un privilège ! » {n}Le commissaire s'empresse de sauter dans le portail qui se referme sans que quiconque puisse intervenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Adieu, mes chers frères et sœurs d'armes. Vous tromper, vous manipuler et vous pousser vers une mort certaine a été à la fois un plaisir et un privilège ! » {n}Le commissaire s'empresse de sauter dans le portail qui se referme sans que quiconque puisse intervenir.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: “再见了，战友们。无论是欺骗、操纵，还是指引你们走向死亡，都是荣耀之举，充满了乐趣！”{n}政委趁其他人来不及阻止，匆忙跳进了正在关闭的传送门。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “再见了，战友们。无论是欺骗、操纵，还是指引你们走向死亡，都是荣耀之举，充满了乐趣！”{n}政委趁其他人来不及阻止，匆忙跳进了正在关闭的传送门。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: 「さらばだ戦友たちよ。君たちを欺き、操り、死に追いやったことは私にとって名誉であり、喜びだったぞ！」{n}誰かが止める間もなく、コミッサーは閉じかけた門へ飛び込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「さらばだ戦友たちよ。君たちを欺き、操り、死に追いやったことは私にとって名誉であり、喜びだったぞ！」{n}誰かが止める間もなく、コミッサーは閉じかけた門へ飛び込んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Lebt wohl, Kameraden. Es war mir eine Ehre, nein, das reinste Vergnügen, Euch zu täuschen, zu manipulieren und in den Tod zu treiben!" {n}Der Kommissar springt durch das sich schließende Portal, bevor es jemand schafft, ihn aufzuhalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lebt wohl, Kameraden. Es war mir eine Ehre, nein, das reinste Vergnügen, Euch zu täuschen, zu manipulieren und in den Tod zu treiben!" {n}Der Kommissar springt durch das sich schließende Portal, bevor es jemand schafft, ihn aufzuhalten.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: «Adiós, camaradas. ¡Ha sido un honor y un placer engañaros, manipularos y enviaros a una muerte segura!». {n}El Comisario salta al portal, que se cierra antes de que nadie tenga ocasión de detenerlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Adiós, camaradas de armas. ¡Ha sido un honor y un placer engañaros, manipularos y enviaros a una muerte segura!». {n}El comisario salta al portal, que se cierra antes de que nadie tenga ocasión de detenerlo.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghCommissar

languages.text: "Elveda yoldaşlarım. Sizi kandırıp parmağımda oynattıktan sonra ölümünüze sürüklemek, benim için tarifsiz bir onurdu!" {n}Komiser, kimse müdahale edip onu durduramadan kapanmakta olan portala atlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Farewell, comrades. Deceiving, manipulating, and nudging you toward your deaths has been an honour and a pleasure!" {n}The Commissar jumps into the closing portal before anyone gets a chance to stop him.{/n}
